properties.name: camel.component.ganglia.autowired-enabled
properties.description: Whether autowiring is enabled. This is used for automatic autowiring options (the option must be marked as autowired) by looking up in the registry to find if there is a single instance of matching type, which then gets configured on the component. This can be used for automatic configuring JDBC data sources, JMS connection factories, AWS Clients, etc.

properties.name: camel.component.ganglia.configuration
properties.description: To use the shared configuration. The option is a org.apache.camel.component.ganglia.GangliaConfiguration type.

properties.name: camel.component.ganglia.dmax
properties.description: Minumum time in seconds before Ganglia will purge the metric value if it expires. Set to 0 and the value will remain in Ganglia indefinitely until a gmond agent restart.

properties.name: camel.component.ganglia.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable auto configuration of the ganglia component. This is enabled by default.

properties.name: camel.component.ganglia.group-name
properties.description: The group that the metric belongs to.

properties.name: camel.component.ganglia.lazy-start-producer
properties.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

properties.name: camel.component.ganglia.metric-name
properties.description: The name to use for the metric.

properties.name: camel.component.ganglia.mode
properties.description: Send the UDP metric packets using MULTICAST or UNICAST

properties.name: camel.component.ganglia.prefix
properties.description: Prefix the metric name with this string and an underscore.

properties.name: camel.component.ganglia.tmax
properties.description: Maximum time in seconds that the value can be considered current. After this, Ganglia considers the value to have expired.

properties.name: camel.component.ganglia.ttl
properties.description: If using multicast, set the TTL of the packets

properties.name: camel.component.ganglia.units
properties.description: Any unit of measurement that qualifies the metric, e.g. widgets, litres, bytes. Do not include a prefix such as k (kilo) or m (milli), other tools may scale the units later. The value should be unscaled.

properties.name: camel.component.ganglia.wire-format31x
properties.description: Use the wire format of Ganglia 3.1.0 and later versions. Set this to false to use Ganglia 3.0.x or earlier.
